name: Fluoride Treatment
discription: Fluoride treatments are typically professional treatments containing a high concentration of fluoride.

name: Cavity Filling
discription: Basically, a cavity is hole in the tooth . This is often often caused by bacteria, which builds up from eating unhealthy food.

name: Teath Whitening
discription: With professional Teeth Whitening treatment, you can enjoy the boost in confidence of a bright, white smile.
